history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00111
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE MODERNIZATION OF THE PHILIPPINE COAST GUARD (PCG) AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : P C G Modernization Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Seeks to allow the Philippine Coast Guard to perform under its different functional areas effective and efficiently.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (006 2016-08-03)2. Bataoil (007 2016-08-08)
3. Sarmiento (C.) (024 2016-09-20)4. Tan (A.) (041 2016-11-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2016-07-26
